text: The Tamil Nadu Sathunavu Oozhiar Sangam has urged the State Government to fill up all the existing vacancies in the noon meal centres across the State. A resolution to this effect was passed at the district conference of the Sangam held here on Friday. They wanted the government to provide family linked pension to the noon meal centre staff. The conference also demanded the government to promote experienced noon meal assistants as cooks. The government to reduce the work burden of the noon meal staff, and provide accommodation in the Tamil Nadu Housing Board Colony houses, the members demanded.
title: ‘Fill up vacancies’
